ServerManager - Class in communications
A class to manage a server that listens for incoming connections on a given port and delegates them to a ConnectionController.
ServerManager(ConnectionController, int) - Constructor for class communications.ServerManager
Constructs a ServerManager with a given ConnectionController and server port.
serverPort - Variable in class communications.ConnectionController
The port on which the server listens for incoming connections.
serverSocket - Variable in class communications.ServerManager
The ServerSocket that the server will listen on for incoming connections.
setCommListener(P2PCommListener) - Method in class communications.ConnectionController
Sets the P2P communication listener for this node and notifies it of all currently connected peers.
setHeader(Long, String, String) - Method in class communications.frames.Frame
Sets the header fields of a packet with the provided values.
setLocalIp(String) - Method in class communications.ConnectionController
Sets the local IP address used for this connection.
setPayload(Object) - Method in class communications.frames.Frame
Sets the payload of the current frame to the specified value.
setPayload(String) - Method in class communications.frames.CloseFrame
There is no payload for a ping acknowledgement frame, so this method does nothing.
setPayload(String) - Method in class communications.frames.PingAckFrame
There is no payload for a ping acknowledgement frame, so this method does nothing.
setPayload(String) - Method in class communications.frames.PingFrame
There is no payload for a ping frame, so this method does nothing.
